trans-unit.source: Paints an area with an image.
trans-unit.target: 使用影像繪製區域。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush> is a type of <xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush> that defines its content as an image, which is specified by its <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush.ImageSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush>是一種<xref:System.Windows.Media.TileBrush>，定義其內容做為映像所指定其<xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush.ImageSource%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can control how the image is stretched, aligned, and tiled, enabling you to produce patterns and other effects.
trans-unit.target: 您可以控制如何影像會延伸，對齊及並排顯示，讓您產生模式和其他效果。

trans-unit.source: The following images show some effects that can be achieved with an <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush>.
trans-unit.target: 下列影像顯示一些可達到的效果<xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush>。

trans-unit.source: ![ImageBrush output examples](~/add/media/wcpsdk-mmgraphics-imagebrushexamples.gif "ImageBrush output examples")
trans-unit.target: ![ImageBrush 輸出範例](~/add/media/wcpsdk-mmgraphics-imagebrushexamples.gif "ImageBrush 輸出範例")

trans-unit.source: An ImageBrush can paint shapes, controls, text, and more
trans-unit.target: ImageBrush 可以繪製圖案、 控制項、 文字和多個

trans-unit.source: As mentioned, an <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush> paints an area with an <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageSource>.
trans-unit.target: 如前所述，<xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush>使用繪製區域<xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageSource>。

trans-unit.source: The most common type of <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageSource> to use with an <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush> is a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>, which describes a bitmap graphic.
trans-unit.target: 最常見的類型<xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageSource>搭配<xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush>是<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>，用來描述點陣圖形。

trans-unit.source: You can use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage> to paint using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing> object, but it is simpler to use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush> instead.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage>來繪製使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing>物件，但它比較容易使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush>改為。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageSource> objects, see [Imaging Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/imaging-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageSource>物件，請參閱[影像處理概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/imaging-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush> features, see [Painting with Images, Drawings, and Visuals](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/painting-with-images-drawings-and-visuals.md) overview.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush>功能，請參閱[使用映像、 繪圖和視覺效果繪製](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/painting-with-images-drawings-and-visuals.md)概觀。

trans-unit.source: Freezable Features
trans-unit.target: Freezable 功能

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush> class inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush> objects gain several special features, which include the following: they can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush>類別繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>，<xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush>物件取得數個特殊的功能，包括下列： 它們可以宣告為多個物件之間共用，變成唯讀，以改善效能、 複製，和進行具備執行緒安全。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the features provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關所提供的功能<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件，請參閱[Freezable 物件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: to display images that you don't have <see cref="T:System.Net.WebPermission" /> or <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission" /> access for.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示的影像，您不需要<see cref="T:System.Net.WebPermission" />或<see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission" />存取。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionImage.SafeImage" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionImage.SafeImage" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush" /> class with no content.
trans-unit.target: 使用無內容的方式，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The image to display.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示的影像。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush" /> class that paints an area with the specified image.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush" /> 類別的新執行個體，其使用指定的影像繪製區域。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush" /> 的可修改複製品，深層複製這個物件的值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true." />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性仍為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush" /> 物件的可修改複製品，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="false" />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性仍為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、資料繫結和動畫，但是會複製其目前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image displayed by this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush" /> 顯示的影像。

trans-unit.source: The image displayed by this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush" /> 顯示的影像。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush> paints an area with an <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageSource>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush>使用繪製區域<xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageSource>。

trans-unit.source: The most common type of <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageSource> to use with an <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush> is a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>, which describes a bitmap graphic.
trans-unit.target: 最常見的類型<xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageSource>搭配<xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush>是<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>，用來描述點陣圖形。

trans-unit.source: You can use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage> to paint using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing> object, but it is simpler to use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush> instead.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage>來繪製使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing>物件，但它比較容易使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush>改為。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageSource> objects, see [Imaging Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/imaging-overview.md) and [Painting with Images, Drawings, and Visuals](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/painting-with-images-drawings-and-visuals.md)
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageSource>物件，請參閱[影像處理概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/imaging-overview.md)和[繪製影像、 繪圖和視覺效果](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/painting-with-images-drawings-and-visuals.md)

trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.target: *imageUri*

trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of an image.
trans-unit.target: A[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]映像。

trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush.ImageSource" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush.ImageSource" /> 相依性屬性。
